SEARCH
Package cpod

Class FPODReader.FPODWavData

java.lang.Object
cpod.FPODReader.FPODWavData
Enclosing class:
FPODReader
public static class FPODReader.FPODWavData extends Object
Holds FPOD wav data. Note this is not actually wav data but the amplitude and inter pulse interval of successive peaks in the waveform.
